About

David Kim is a technology enthusiast and science writer with a background in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. He specializes in breaking down complex tech concepts into accessible articles for a wide audience. With over a decade of experience in the tech industry, David brings practical insights and a forward-thinking perspective to his writing.

Topics
